Package videoRangePanel.layoutFX

Class VRMediaView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
pamViewFX.fxNodes.PamBorderPane
videoRangePanel.layoutFX.VRMediaView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, VRImage
public class VRMediaView extends PamBorderPane implements VRImage
Basic media player to watch videos in the video range module.
